## CoreTags.LIFE\_CYCLE\_OBSERVER\_GROUP variable

Binding tag for group name of life cycle observers

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
LIFE_CYCLE_OBSERVER_GROUP = "lifeCycleObserverGroup"
```
